main event: A white, basketball-sized object was observed travelling west in a straight line over Marshalltown, Iowa on June 24, 1956.
interesting points: The object was observed for 4.1 minutes by a ground witness.
The object faded from sight after travelling west.
The sighting was initially considered as possibly being an aircraft, but the report concludes it was of unknown origin.
The report mentions a single-engine trainer aircraft circling in the area at the time of the sighting.
The report indicates that the altitude estimate could be in error.
